content: Create BlockCreator.js - Main visual block creation interface with drag-and-drop
Create ComponentLibrary.js - Sidebar component library with draggable elements
Create StyleEditor.js - Visual CSS style editor for blocks
Create FieldConfiguration.js - Interface for defining block attributes
Create PreviewPanel.js - Live preview of blocks being created
Create BlockManager.js - Interface for managing existing blocks
Create main index.js file that exports all components
